amendment.description: To provide emergency relief for veterans healthcare, school construction, healthcare and transportation needs in the United States, and to create 95,000 new jobs.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1823 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 35. Record Vote Number: 379.

Amendment SA 1823 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S12358; text: CR S12358) To provide emergency relief for veterans healthcare, school construction, healthcare and transportation needs in the United States, and to create 95,000 new jobs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1823 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 35. Record Vote Number: 379.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1823 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Stabenow.
